name: Dan Ryckert's Dating Simulator
description:
Now you can finally get to know what it's like to date the infamous Dirty Dan Ryckert.

Features:

- Multiple questions based on the teachings of Mr. Ryckert himself.

- 10 unique endings that tell the story of how your date with Dan went

- A hidden easter egg

- Amazing art (if you compare it to some of the earliest games, although even then it's a bit of a stretch)

The controls are as follow:

Movement = Left and Right keys

Answering questions = Numeric keys (1,2,3)

GLHB!
